mapper.select: SELECT p.product_request_no AS productRequestNo ,p.sub_product_request_no AS subProductRequestNo ,p.address_no AS addressNo ,p.product_name AS productName ,p.product_option AS productOption ,p.product_quantity AS productQuantity ,p.requests AS requests , p.`status` AS status ,p.create_user AS createUser ,p.create_date AS createDate ,q.`status` AS quotationStatus FROM product_request p LEFT OUTER JOIN quotation q ON p.product_request_no = q.product_request_no
